content: back of loop measures 14 18 21 23 26 28 cm working on these 6 sts only proceed decrease - together 5½ 7 8¼ 9 10¼ 11 in ending with as follows - ws - wrong side a rs row yfwd - yarn forward right strap join legs cont in g-st until strap measures back next row purl to end cast on 3 3 2 12 12 13 13 14 15 cm 4¾ 4¾ 5¼ right leg 4 2 4 sts and with ws facing purl 5¼ 5½ 6 in from cast off sts ending using 3¼mm needles and thumb across 24 26 29 29 31 31 sts left on with a ws row method cast on 20 20 22 22 24 26 sts stitch holder for right leg next row buttonhole row k1 1st row knit 51 55 60 62 64 66 sts k2tog yfwd k3 1st row sets g-st garter stitch cont without shaping until work work 4 row more in g-st work 7 row more in g-st measures 18 25 31 36 40 43 cm cast off knitways change to 4mm needles and proceed 7 9¾ 12 14 15¾ 17 in ending with as follows - a rs row left strap 1st row knit next row p1 1 2 3 1 2 increase in next with rs facing using 3¼mm needles 2nd row purl st purlways p11 12 10 10 11 11 increase rejoin yarn to 6 sts left on a stitch 1st and 2nd row set st-st stocking in next st purlways 4 4 5 5 5 5 times holder stitch ** p1 1 2 3 2 3 56 60 66 68 70 72 sts cont in g-st until strap measures next row knit to last 2 sts increase in 1st row knit 12 12 13 13 14 15 cm 4¾ 4¾ 5¼ next st inside edge k1 2nd row p1 1 2 1 2 1 * k2 p2 repeat 5¼ 5½ 6 in from cast off sts ending 21 21 23 23 25 27 sts from * to last 3 3 0 3 0 3 sts k2 p1 with a ws row work 16 12 6 40 8 64 row increase 1 st 1 1 0 1 0 1 times next row buttonhole row k3 at inside edge as before in every foll 1st and 2nd row set patt yfwd k2tog k1 8th 6th 6th 8th 8th 16th row cont in patt until work measures work 4 row more in g-st 23 23 24 28 26 31 sts 28 35 41 46 50 53 cm 11 13¾ 16 cast off knitways 18 19¾ 21 in ending with a ws row for 1st 2nd 3rd 4th and 5th sizes only shape armholes front work 10 24 40 10 50 row increase 1 st cast off 6 7 7 7 7 7 sts in patt at beg work as given for back to *** at inside edge as before in every foll of next 2 row 44
